message.content:
1. There were 8 subjects in the study.
2. The subjects were randomly provided with either glucose or water.
3. The amount of glucose provided was 1 g/kg body weight.
4. The glucose was mixed in 200 mL of water.
5. The other group was given 200 mL of water alone.
6. The substances were provided 30 minutes prior to exercise.
7. The exercise involved walking on a treadmill.
8. The intensity of the exercise was 50% of VO2max.
9. The duration of the exercise was 60 minutes.

messages.content:
Statement: Subjects (n=8) were randomly provided with either 1 g/kg body weight of glucose in 200 mL water (CHO) or 200 mL water alone (CON) 30 min prior to exercise and subsequently walked on a treadmill at 50% of VO2max for 60 min.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
